type: Tutorial Step - Here's How it Works...

definition.text: Got it? The Trading Bot places the Limit Buy Order at the fifth support level! What's the logic behind this?

paragraphs.text: It's sort of arbitrary, but the strategy defines a falling knife as the price action capable of breaching at least four support levels and getting to the fifth during a single minute. Statistically, such events—in this time frame—produce more bounces than continuations. They may be caused by large market orders that temporarily increase the bid/ask spread in the order book.
Take a minute to verify that buy orders are placed at the fifth support level!
